trans-unit.source: A collection that stores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Insieme che contiene oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the columns in an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> classe rappresenta la raccolta di tutti gli stili consentono di descrivere le colonne in un oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> da aggiungere a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un elemento a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in cui è stato inserito il nuovo elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Add%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Add%2A> metodo consente di riapplicare il layout della tabella a tutti i controlli corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> contenitore.

trans-unit.source: The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
trans-unit.target: Il numero degli stili archiviati in una raccolta è limitato solo dalla memoria disponibile.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> da individuare in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore può essere <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> specificato è incluso nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> si trova in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> da individuare in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specific item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina l'indice di un elemento specifico in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of <paramref name="columnStyle" /> if found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di <paramref name="columnStyle" /> si trova nella classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> method begins searching at the first element of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> and ends either when it finds a match or it reaches the last element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> metodo inizia la ricerca del primo elemento del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> e termina quando viene trovata una corrispondenza o raggiunge l'ultimo elemento.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero nel quale <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> deve essere inserito.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> da inserire in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" /> at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> nell'insieme <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" /> nella posizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Insert%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Insert%2A> metodo consente di riapplicare il layout della tabella a tutti i controlli corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> contenitore.

trans-unit.source: The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
trans-unit.target: Il numero degli stili archiviati in una raccolta è limitato solo dalla memoria disponibile.

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the inserted element.
trans-unit.target: In raccolte di elementi adiacenti, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> (classe), gli elementi successivi al punto di inserimento spostati verso il basso per consentire l'inserimento dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiornati anche gli indici degli elementi spostati.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> da ottenere o impostare.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> da rimuovere da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore può essere <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la prima occorrenza di un elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> specifico dalla classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Remove%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Remove%2A> metodo consente di riapplicare il layout della tabella a tutti i controlli corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> contenitore.

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the deletion point move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: In raccolte di elementi adiacenti, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> (classe), gli elementi successivi al punto di eliminazione spostano su per occupare la posizione rimasta vuota.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiornati anche gli indici degli elementi spostati.
